description: Verify that clicking the 'Bugün' button resets the calendar date to its initial state after changing the date.

steps.name: Login to the application with valid credentials
Navigate to the Student Information Screen
Change the calendar date using the next date button
Click the 'Bugün' button and verify the calendar resets
